text:
We are starting on HubSpot and would like to know what is the best method to send information from the backend of our website to HubSpot. Custom behavioral events are not working well for us. For API, there is a more complete documentation that we are following.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/overview>

In case anyone comes across this like I just did, neither the theme name nor the path from right clicking on the design manager worked for me.

But just running `hs cms lighthouse-score` with no theme-path specified had me then choose a theme and that worked.
